objectDesc.p: Ostracon, 10.5x12.2 (?), 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 9 (?) line(s) per column, 14-17 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Excavated 1893-1894 by Henri Édouard Naville, Egypt Exploration Society at Necropolis of Thebes, Miṣr.
Transferred 1900 to British Museum at London, England.

msIdentifier.msName: Inv. EA 33101, British Museum, London, England.

sourceDesc.bibl: Crum, W. E., Coptic Ostraca, no. 515, The Egypt Exploration Fund: London, England, 1902. OCLC 26637089.
